name: LEGO Chess
description:
LEGO Chess is a strategy game developed by Krisalis Software. It came out on 11-11-1998. LEGO Media published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play LEGO Chess on PC.
Dave Upchurch and Stewart Green produced the game. It was directed by Andrew Ware. It was scored by David R. Punshon and Richard Wells.
